thread.title: What’s the Fastest Way to Make Someone an Atheist?
thread.title_full: What’s the Fastest Way to Make Someone an Atheist?

author: Hemant Mehta
title: What’s the Fastest Way to Make Someone an Atheist?
text:
January 29, 2017 by Hemant Mehta Leave a Comment 
The video below, part of The Atheist Voice series, discusses the fastest way to make someone an atheist. (And whether we should even be thinking about that.) 
A rough transcript of the video can be found on the YouTube page in the “About” section. 
We’d love to hear your thoughts on the project — more videos will be posted soon — and we’d also appreciate your suggestions as to which questions we ought to tackle next!
